TopicTitle: Hello, Thank you + I has Video

Articles.Content:
Hello all and a thanks to Squad for developing a little gem.

What a fantastic \'sandboxy\' type game, I\'ve learnt a bit about physics too.

Anyway, I made a video. If you find the time to watch and give me feedback on rocket design, flight control, anything really, I\'d be grateful.

I captured a mission where I launch a satellite into orbit and splash down safely.

It\'s here if you\'d like to take a look. http://youtu.be/hMirQSp5CdI

Thanks SJ

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!
